about_the_game:
Secret Paws - Cozy Offices is a 3D hidden objects game where your mission is to find hidden cats in cozy offices.

Open drawers, cabinets, and move objects to discover the most unexpected hiding spots. Every corner of the offices holds surprises and challenges as you explore a richly detailed isometric 3D environment.

Features

  • Innovative 3D hidden objects: An innovative game combining classic exploration mechanics with a 3D isometric environment. 🚀

  • Nearly 500 hidden cats: Find cats of all colors, sizes, and personalities. 😺

  • Secret cats: Discover special cats in unique hiding spots. 💡

  • Detailed interactivity: Open furniture, move objects, and interact with the environment. 😻

  • Hint system: Use hints to highlight a random cat when you're struggling. 🔎

Are you ready to prove you're the master at finding cats?
